## Describe the bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Seed value

Paste the seed shown in the status bar (e.g. `1714000000000`). This is critical for reproducing deterministic issues.

## Steps to reproduce

1. Open the sandbox with seed `...`
2. Click **Start** and wait N ticks
3. ...

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened (include console errors if any).

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain the issue.
